name: Get Stuck!
description:
Get Stuck! is our entry to the Wowie Jam 3.0!

Brain teasing puzzles and simplistic design makes for an enjoyable experience for anyone! Get Stuck! is a 2D puzzle game where the objective is to reach the trophies and getting stuck.

MOVEMENT: Arrow keys or WASD
RESET LEVEL: R

How does it fit the Jam?

As always, wanted something that is easy to pickup and challenging while at the same time capturing the theme. While getting stuck is already associated with failure it is not the only thing that fits the theme. Some levels require you to progress by moving in a certain direction, but moving too far will cause you to fail the level.

Remember to leave a rating and comment with feedback! :)
